events.message: I recently received my order but would like to request a refund because the item does not meet my expectations.
The customer's request was identified as a refund inquiry based on the message content mentioning refund and dissatisfaction.
The case has been assigned to an agent specialized in refund processing for further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand you want to request a refund and I’m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for your refund request so I can assist you better?
My order number is 123456789. The product color was completely different from what was advertised, so I want to return it.
Thank you for the details. We can process a full refund once you return the product. I will send you a prepaid return label shortly.
That sounds good, thank you for your help. I appreciate the prepaid label as it makes the return easier.
We have sent the return label to your email. Once we receive the product, the refund will be issued immediately.
Just following up to confirm if you were able to send the item back and if you need any further assistance with the refund.
Yes, I sent the package yesterday and I haven’t received the refund yet, but I’ll wait a bit longer.
We noticed the return was received. Please allow 2-3 business days for the refund to appear in your account.
Thank you, I just saw the refund in my account today. Appreciate your help throughout this process.
The refund case has been successfully closed after confirming the customer received their refund.
